name: UpdateAwsCurConfigStatus
description:
Updates status or configuration of an AWS CUR config.

Use this tool to update the active/archived status or account filtering settings of an AWS Cost and Usage Report (CUR) configuration in Datadog for a specified cloud account.

parameters.name: cloud_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the AWS cloud account to configure in Datadog.

parameters.name: aws_cur_config_request_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of AWS CUR config Patch Request, usually 'aws_cur_config_patch_request'.

value_schema.description: Type of AWS CUR config Patch Request.

parameters.name: excluded_aws_account_ids
parameters.description: List of AWS account IDs to exclude from the billing dataset when "include_new_accounts" is true.

value_schema.description: The AWS account IDs to be excluded from your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `true`.

parameters.name: included_aws_accounts
parameters.description: List of AWS account IDs to be included in the billing dataset when `include_new_accounts` is `false`.

value_schema.description: The AWS account IDs to be included in your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `false`.

parameters.name: automatic_inclusion_of_new_accounts
parameters.description: Set to true to automatically include new member accounts by default in your billing dataset.

value_schema.description: Whether or not to automatically include new member accounts by default in your billing dataset.

parameters.name: is_cost_management_enabled
parameters.description: Indicates whether the Cloud Cost Management account is enabled. Accepts a boolean value.

value_schema.description: Whether or not the Cloud Cost Management account is enabled.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.account_filters.excluded_accounts
parameters.description: The AWS account IDs to be excluded from your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `true`.

value_schema.description: The AWS account IDs to be excluded from your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `true`.

parameters.name: data.attributes.account_filters.include_new_accounts
parameters.description: Whether or not to automatically include new member accounts by default in your billing dataset.

value_schema.description: Whether or not to automatically include new member accounts by default in your billing dataset.

parameters.name: data.attributes.account_filters.included_accounts
parameters.description: The AWS account IDs to be included in your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `false`.

value_schema.description: The AWS account IDs to be included in your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `false`.

parameters.name: data.attributes.is_enabled
parameters.description: Whether or not the Cloud Cost Management account is enabled.

value_schema.description: Whether or not the Cloud Cost Management account is enabled.

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: Type of AWS CUR config Patch Request.

value_schema.description: Type of AWS CUR config Patch Request.
